Description:
Endless Possibilities on 650m2*
Bathed in natural light, this 3 bedroom home (master with ensuite), offers a functional floor plan in an enviable location.
Upon entry you are greeted with a formal front lounge, leading through to a well-appointed kitchen overlooking the family/meals area, central bathroom, large outdoor entertaining area, oversized private backyard & ample off-street parking space.
Ideally positioned in one of the most convenient & sought after pockets of Craigieburn, this home is close to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, public transport, Craigieburn Road, Willmott Park Primary School & much more.
Further features include; heating, cooling, carport with roller door & so much more!
Explore the potential this home has to offer whether you're a home buyer, investor, or future developer (STCA) - Call now!

Description:
PERFECT STARTER IN PRIME LOCATION
With quiet residential surrounds and close proximity to Craigieburn Secondary College, Hothlyn Drive Bakery, schools and train station, this generously-proportioned solid brick home offers complete comfort and ease of living. An ideal opportunity for first-time home buyers, empty nesters and investors.
The floorplan comprises a spacious lounge, generous kitchen with access to an outdoor courtyard and spacious second yard to the side of the home, three bedrooms with built-in robes, separate laundry and central bathroom with tub.
With an abundance of nearby local amenities, including medical centres, Craigieburn Plaza, reserves, not to mention an impressive selection of schools. This quality property offers an enriching and convenient suburban lifestyle in an established and much-loved locale.

Description:
4 BEDROOMS, 4 LIVING AREAS & STUDY ON 808M2
Set proudly on 808m2 (approx.) be welcomed by its impressive classic facade & graced by the homes impressive interior that flaunts a touch of class & captivating spaces.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms, (oversized master with walk-in robe & en-suite with double shower), 4 Living areas, study / 5th Bedroom, fully equipped kitchen with stone benchtops, ample cupboard space and an abundance of storage space overlooking a large family & meals area leading to a perfectly large backyard with plenty of room for the kids to play.
Journey on through the home to a separate formal lounge/entertainment area, downstairs bedroom / study, an impressive upstairs rumpus offering plenty of options for the growing family. Added to this is a downstairs powder room, roomy laundry, oversized garage with internal access & high ceilings. Furthermore, upstairs contains its very own private retreat area, 4 great size bedrooms serviced by the striking main bathroom.
This aspirational family home provides the perfect lifestyle in one of Craigieburn's most sought-after-pockets. Centrally located and close by to all of Craigieburn's amenities including local schools, public transport and beautiful parklands. This is an amazing opportunity to secure a home that provides for growing families. Be quick as this one won't hang around for long. Inspection will not disappoint!!

Attention all developers, builders, & investors.!!
Universal Real Estate Vic Presents this best located house on a large allotment of 654 sqm approx, which is ideal for redevelopment into multi unit site Subject to Council Approval or just to add a diamond in your investment portfolio.
Once in a life time opportunity. Attention all developers, builders, & investors, this is what you have been waiting for. Set in a most convenient neighbourhood. This property for an astute investor to invest in their future. This property is walking distance to Local Shops, Convenience Stores and Medical Centre and Close to Craigieburn Plaza, Hume Freeway, Schools, Leisure Centre, Craigieburn Train Station all other local amenities Craigieburn has to offer.
This light filled home consists of 2 bedrooms, One Bathroom and open Kitchen meals and living area.
In Craigieburn there is not much land available for sale. Taking into comparison the house sales, statistics show the median house sale price in Craigieburn has increased by 46.11% over the last 5 years 1. So take advantage and apply for a planning permit and reap the rewards in the future. With easy access to Hume Freeway, Melbourne Airport and more, provides the best attributes for this potential multi-unit development site subject to council approval with land size 654m2 approx. this one ticks all the boxes.
Avoid missing out this opportunity and call now Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397

Description:
Exceptional Family Flexibility with Perfect Parkland Views
Set on a vast corner allotment with the open spaces of Malcolm Creek Reserve across the road, this amazing home provides a fantastic family lifestyle with its vast & versatile floorplan, sensational outdoor entertaining areas, & for the tradies a huge high-clearance workshop.
High ceilings throughout, the home's free-flowing interior showcases an extra-large master
bedroom with walk-in robes, 3 additional bedrooms, stylish ensuite & main family bathroom - both with floor-to-ceiling tiles.
Multiple living zones add to its family credentials including a formal lounge, rumpus or home office (upstairs) & expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a stone-bench
kitchen with ample cupboard space, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other highlights include ducted heating, evaporative cooling & additional split-system air-conditioning, Blackbutt solid timber floors, integrated speakers, solar power, CCTV, premium Air-Cell insulation & laminated windows all-round.
Bi-folds reveal a large outdoor deck, as well as an enormous al-fresco style entertaining area complete with mains-connected BBQ & rangehood, drive-through double garage (remote-control) with internal entry & storage space above, plus an 9m x 7.5m clearspan workshop with high- clearance rollerdoor & additional gated off-street parking (via Woodlea Crescent).
Sensational family living, it's also close to public transport (buses on Hanson Road), popular primary & secondary schools, sports & recreational facilities, major shopping centres as well as easy access to the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 5 Creekwood Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY IN PRIME LOCATION
This original brick home presents a huge opportunity for any investor, developer or first home buyer looking to get their foot into a high growth suburb. Sitting on a large block of approximately 651m2, one lucky buyer will gain the potential to rent out immediately, flip for profit or develop S.T.C.A.
Positioned in one of the most desired pockets of Craigieburn, you will be close to all amenities, only 5 minutes to the Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, schools, sporting grounds, Hume Hwy access and more. This is truly a value-for-money deal!
Offering:
Separate formal living area upon entry
Well-appointed kitchen with adjoining meals / dining area
3 good sized bedrooms with built in wardrobes
Central bathroom
Separate toilet
Wall heater, A/C unit and ceiling fan
Garden shed
Carport with side access into the backyard
Large backyard with potential to subdivide S.T.C.A
Potential rental return of approx. $1,603.00pcm for investors
Zoning: general residential Zone 1
Location, Location, Location! 800m to schools, 2.4km to Craigieburn Plaza, 2.4km to Craigieburn Train Station, 2.7km to Hume Hwy, 3.3 km to Craigieburn Central, 5km to Mickleham Road, 24km to Melbourne CBD and 17km to Melbourne Airport.

Description:
Move In & Start Living
In a blissfully quiet location, this feature-packed home delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with its versatile floorplan, quality inclusions & outdoor entertaining space. Its light-filled interior showcases a conveniently located guest bedroom downstairs with ensuite, 2 bedrooms upstairs (master with ensuite & walk-in robe), built in study area & central bathroom (3rd).
A spacious open plan layout, with amazing timber flooring, includes gourmet kitchen with great bench space & walk-in-pantry, separate dining space & large living area which effortlessly leads to a low maintenance outdoor entertaining area.
Many additional features include; heating, cooling, double remote garage with internal access & much more!
Located to please, this home is close to Craigieburn Train Station, bus services, both primary & secondary schools, local parks & Aitken Creek trails, it's also close to childcare centres & kindergartens, local shops (Hothlyn Drive), choice of shopping centres & easy freeway access.

Description:
Versatile Style with Architectural Flair
In a leafy Mt Aitken neighbourhood with parkland at the end of the street, this outstanding single- level residence delivers a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle opportunity along with easy access to the area's key attractions & amenities.
Fabulous decor, a charming colour palette & flexible floorplan complement an attractive
facade & manicured gardens. Designed for easy living this striking residence boasts comfort & style that will delight the most discerning buyer.
Quality from start to finish, its free-flowing design comprises 4 large bedrooms (master with walk-in robes & 5-star ensuite) & dazzling central bathroom with freestanding tub.
Add to this a connoisseur's stone kitchen with butler's pantry that adjoins an oversized meals/family room, plus a roomy laundry & gorgeous outdoor setting providing peace & privacy
that will be sensational for all social gatherings.
Further features include high square set ceilings, heightened doorways, double remote garage
with drive-thru access, landscaped gardens, ducted heating & refrigerated cooling.
Situated for absolute convenience, this home is within walking distance to Craigieburn Road
buses, Highlands Lake, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, as well as easy access to the
area's primary & secondary schools.

Description:
Comfort and Convenience in Craigieburn
Presenting an exciting opportunity for young families and first home buyers to enter the growing suburb of Craigieburn, this exceptional single level home offers an easy-care lifestyle close to amenities, expansive parklands and everything Craigieburn has to offer.
This well-appointed home offers:
- Two generously sized bedrooms
- Central tiled bathroom with shower over bath
- Private ensuite adjoining the light-filled master bedroom
- Sizeable open plan living/kitchen/dining enjoying an abundance of natural light and easy access to the rear yard
- L-shaped kitchen with quality appliances, tiled splashback and plenty of storage space
- Spacious rear yard, perfect for those with young children and pets
- Single car garage with internal access
- Split system heating and cooling providing comfort in every season
The location is ideal, with the expansive Malcolm Creek Parklands hosting a plethora of playgrounds and walking trails, along with Newbury Primary School, Mount Ridley College, Highlands Shopping Centre and Craigieburn Central just a short distance away. This location has everything young families need to grow and thrive.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy
In the family-focused Fairways Estate and located within easy reach of all amenities, this beautiful home presents a ready-made lifestyle of size & versatility with its functional floorplan & comfortable block of land.
For buyers that appreciate space, light & functionality the home enjoys a free-flowing design which highlights formal lounge/home theatre, 4 bedrooms all with built in robes (ensuite to master & a MASSIVE walk in robe), kitchen with 900mm SS appliances plus dishwasher, ample bench & cupboard space overlooking an adjoining meals continuing seamlessly through to the family area.
Adding to the properties appeal is a wonderfully large pergola perfect for entertaining, single car garage with drive-thru access, double drive-way with side gate access, low maintenance landscaped gardens with outdoor gazebo plus a garden shed, ducted heating, split system cooling, quality window furnishings, security alarm, CCTV, outdoor spa & so much more!
Situated to please, close to parkland, schools, shops & public transport. If family space, comfort & location are high on your agenda, then this home is a must inspect!

Description:
ELEVATED FAMILY HOME WITH CITY VIEWS
Here is a fantastic opportunity to buy a home in the popular Mt. Ridley / Highlands Estate located in a quiet street and surrounded by quality homes, offering comfortable and modern living.
Comprising:
4 excellent size bedrooms, master with ensuite and spa bath, study or 5th bedroom, great kitchen with s/s appliances, meals / family area, separate rumpus / theatre room with projector and screen, outdoor undercover entertaining area, double garage with rear access, ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning x 2, alarm system and much more!

Description:
Brand New quality home ready to move in!!
Open the door to your brand new home! This lovely located close to schools & new shopping centre, includes many quality features! Fit for all the family, it features 4 bedrooms, the master with ensuite and walk in robe, 2 living areas including, formal lounge & family room, a gourmet kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances,
double garage with remote control access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality flooring throughout and front landscaping add to the value of this wonderful home.

Description:
SOLD BY CON PEDIS
An impressive family home in a very desirable and popular location of Fairways Village Craigieburn. Located just a short walk from child care centre, shops, parks and proposed school. The home itself is very spacious offering 5 good sized bedrooms plus Study 2 Master with ensuite and walk in robe, impressive covered outdoor entertaining area and spacious kitchen equipped with 900mm S/S appliances and ample of cupboard space, overlooking family / meals area. Separate formal lounge, rumpus room is perfect for a big family.
Includes ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, window furnishing, garden shed and list goes on. Call now to inspect.
A/H Romeo Sassine 0411 882 605
Peter (Pushpinder) Deol 0413 645 744
Con Pedis 0413 123 643

Description:
WORK FROM HOME!!!
wow fantastic opportunity for a large family or a trade's person who is looking for space and comfort.
this quality home offers 4 fantastic size bedrooms, master with elegant ensuite and wir, a light filled central bathroom with corner spa.
formal entrance leading to a large step down lounge with cathedral ceilings, magnificent hostess timber kitchen equipped with 900mm s/s appliances including dishwasher.
adjoining meals area, separate rumpus room with in built timber wall unit.
fantastic size undercover outdoor entertainment area which can also be used to accommodate up to 8 cars, caravan or trailer.
other features are a magnificent size tradies work shed for those who work from home or looking for that extra space. ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioner, alarm system, intercom system and much more.
call now to inspect
A/H CON PEDIS 0413 123 643
OR
PETER DEOL 0413 645 744
Con Pedis : 0413 123 643
